<br>

Welcome to the Summer 2022 course website for the Summer Prep Bootcamp offered by the Department of [Statistical Sciences](http://utstat.toronto.edu).


__Overview__

This three-week bootcamp is designed to get incoming PhD students up to speed on foundational mathematical, statistical, and computing concepts in a low pressure environment to prepare for coursework in the upcoming semester. 


Important information related to the course will be posted on this website including:

 - [Course syllabus](syllabus.html)
 
 - [Class Documents](class_docs.html)
